text: Guru Da Banda is an animated historical drama Film, Punjabi film directed by Jassi Chana with a released date of August 24, 2018. Produced by Joginder Singh Bhangalia and Sonu Bhangalia under the banner Pritam Films Production, the film was released on 24 August 2018' == References == == External links == * * Category:2018 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Punjabi-language films Category:Indian animated films Category:Films about Sikhism Category:Indian computer-animated films Category:Films set in the Mughal Empire Category:Films set in the Sikh Empire Category:Cultural depictions of Sikh gurus
title: Guru Da Banda
